original_text: The disciples also had a few small fish, so Jesus thanked God for these. Then he told his disciples to give the fish to the people too.
korean_text: 또 작은 생선 두어 마리가 있는지라 이에 축복하시고 명하사 이것도 나누어 주게 하시니

sentences.original_text: The disciples also had a few small fish
sentences.korean_translation: 제자들에게도 작은 생선 몇 마리가 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: so Jesus thanked God for these
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 예수님은 이것들에 대해 하나님께 감사했습니다

sentences.original_text: to give the fish to the people too
